Art & Effort

I think I’ve always had a knack for doing maths or philosophy. This is much less true for art, where I’ve had to work very hard to get from drawing like this in my early 30s to being able to create what you can see here or here.

This reflects how I work. I always put a lot of effort in what I do. And I always make sure the things I produce are visually and artistically compelling.
